content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-23.0, -66.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-23.0, -66.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-21.5, -65.5) for collecting iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -65.5) transferring iron plates from the furnace to the chest
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-25.0, -64.0) connected via transport belts to the furnace

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) for collecting iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring iron plates from the furnace to the chest

### Coal Mining Operation at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) for collecting coal

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) for collecting iron ore

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Inserters Running Out of Fuel
- Ensure that all inserters have a sufficient supply of fuel to maintain continuous operation. Regularly check and refuel inserters to prevent interruptions in material transfer.

### Errors Due to Furnaces Running Out of Ingredients
- Regularly supply furnaces with the necessary ingredients to avoid production halts. Implement a consistent supply chain to ensure furnaces are continuously fed with raw materials.
